column4: can anyone help me out, i'm having trouble getting ubuntu to boot up

cool thanks a lot, whenever i try to start ubuntu it hangs on "starting hotplug subsystems" and when i try under recover mode it gives me errors like kernel panic not syncing fatal exception in interrupt or attempted to kill init
i can mess around in my bios to turn off my pci video card and it skips "starting hotplug subsystems" but i'd much rather use my video card than integrated video
That sounds like the kernel's hanging when loading a device driver
